adventure

Class GameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • adventure.GameWorld

  • public class GameWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about the game world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameWorld(java.lang.String location, java.util.List<java.lang.String> inventory, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Room> roomMap, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Thing> thingMap, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CustomResponder> responderMap)
      Constructs a game world using a default location, a list of inventory items, a mapping of room names to room objects, a mapping of thing names to thing objects, and a mapping of room or thing names to custom responders.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameWorld

        public GameWorld(java.lang.String location,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> inventory,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Room> roomMap,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Thing> thingMap,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CustomResponder> responderMap)
        Constructs a game world using a default location, a list of inventory items, a mapping of room names to room objects, a mapping of thing names to thing objects, and a mapping of room or thing names to custom responders.
        Parameters:
        location - the starting location (room) of the player
        inventory - a list of inventory items (things)
        roomMap - a mapping of room names to room objects
        thingMap - a mapping of thing names to thing objects
        responderMap - a mapping of room or thing names to custom responders
